id.description: Unique identifier of the notification to be updated

emailEnabledForProvider.description: enable/disable the email sent to you

smsEnabledForProvider.description: enable/disable the SMS sent to you

emailEnabledForCustomer.description: enable/disable the email sent to your customer

smsEnabledForCustomer.description: enable/disable the SMS sent to your customer

phoneCallEnabledForCustomer.description: enable/disable voice notification sent to your customer

whatsappEnabledForCustomer.description: enable/disable WhatsApp messages for your customer

scheduleOffset.description:
Specifies how many days before the due date the notification must be sent.
 For the `PAYMENT_DUEDATE_WARNING` event, the accepted values are: `0`, `5`, `10`, `15` and `30`
 For the `PAYMENT_OVERDUE` event, the accepted values are: `1`, `7`, `15` and `30`
